thread.title: AdWords IF functions roll out for ad customization as Standard Text Ads sunset
thread.title_full: AdWords IF functions roll out for ad customization as Standard Text Ads sunset

author: Ginny Marvin
title: AdWords IF functions roll out for ad customization as Standard Text Ads sunset
text:
IF functions arrive to let advertisers customize ads based on device and retargeting list membership. The post AdWords IF functions roll out for ad customization as Standard Text Ads sunset appeared first on Search Engine Land.

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
